text: Hi, I am reading the op/go-logging library recently, I find the go-logging does not support write the logs asynchronous (<https://github.com/op/go-logging/blob/master/log_nix.go#L59>, <https://github.com/op/go-logging/blob/master/logger.go#L166>) by my understanding. It will effect our performance definitely. We should move to use other better alternatives, anyone has some comments on this. <@U0XR6J961> what do u think?
